Class AbstractVersionsDisplayMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.AbstractVersionsUpdaterMojo
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.AbstractVersionsDisplayMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
DisplayDependencyUpdatesMojo, DisplayExtensionUpdatesMojo, DisplayParentUpdatesMojo, DisplayPluginUpdatesMojo, DisplayPropertyUpdatesMojo
public abstract class AbstractVersionsDisplayMojo extends AbstractVersionsUpdaterMojo
Abstract base class for the Display___ mojos.
Author:
Stephen Connolly

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected boolean
    logOutput
    Controls whether the display output is logged to the console.
    protected String
    outputEncoding
    The character encoding to use when writing to outputFile.
    protected File
    outputFile
    If specified then the display output will be sent to the specified file.
    protected int
    outputLineWidth
    Line width which should be used to format the padding of the version info list output.
    protected boolean
    overwriteOutput
    If true, output file will be overwritten if it already exists

  • Field Details

    • outputFile

      @Parameter(property="versions.outputFile") protected File outputFile
      If specified then the display output will be sent to the specified file.
      Since:
      2.2

    • overwriteOutput

      @Parameter(property="versions.overwriteOutput", defaultValue="false") protected boolean overwriteOutput
      If true, output file will be overwritten if it already exists
      Since:
      2.20

    • logOutput

      @Parameter(property="versions.logOutput", defaultValue="true") protected boolean logOutput
      Controls whether the display output is logged to the console.
      Since:
      2.2

    • outputEncoding

      @Parameter(property="outputEncoding", defaultValue="${project.reporting.outputEncoding}") protected String outputEncoding
      The character encoding to use when writing to outputFile.
      Since:
      2.2

    • outputLineWidth

      @Parameter(property="versions.outputLineWidth", defaultValue="80") protected int outputLineWidth
      Line width which should be used to format the padding of the version info list output.
      Since:
      2.10.0

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractVersionsDisplayMojo

      @Inject protected AbstractVersionsDisplayMojo(ArtifactFactory artifactFactory, org.eclipse.aether.RepositorySystem repositorySystem, Map<String, org.apache.maven.wagon.Wagon> wagonMap, Map<String, ChangeRecorder> changeRecorders) throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
      Creates a new instance.
      Parameters:
      artifactFactory - a ArtifactFactory instance
      repositorySystem - a RepositorySystem instance
      wagonMap - a map of Wagon instances per protocol
      changeRecorders - a map of change recorders
      Throws:
      org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - thrown if an error occurs

  • Method Details

    • logInit

      protected void logInit()
      Initialise logging to file if required.

    • logLine

      protected void logLine(boolean error, String line)
      Log a line to the console and/or the output file as configured.
      Parameters:
      error - if true log as error, otherwise as info
      line - the line to log

    • getOutputLineWidthOffset

      protected int getOutputLineWidthOffset()
      Get the offset of the configured output line width compared to the default with of 80.
      Returns:
      Offset of the configured output line width compared to the default with of 80.
